2024-12-18.riddle: היי אני חידה בעברית התשובה היא שלום?

2025-01-09.riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

2025-01-10.riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

2025-01-11.riddle: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?

2025-01-12.riddle: What has keys, but no locks; space, but no room; and you can enter, but not go in?

2025-01-13.riddle: I am not alive, but I grow; I don't have lungs, but I need air; I don't have a mouth, but water kills me. What am I?

2025-01-14.riddle: What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?

2025-01-15.riddle: I have branches, but no fruit, trunk or leaves. What am I?

2025-01-16.riddle: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?

2025-01-17.riddle: I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I?

2025-01-18.riddle: What goes up but never comes down?

2025-01-19.riddle: I have keys, but no locks. I have space, but no room. You can enter, but can't go in. What am I?

2025-01-20.riddle: What has many keys but can't open a single lock?

2025-01-21.riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

2025-01-22.riddle: I am an odd number. Take away a letter and I become even. What number am I?

2025-01-23.riddle: What can you catch, but not throw?

2025-01-24.riddle: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?

2025-01-25.riddle: What has a neck but no head?

2025-01-26.riddle: What runs but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, has a bed but never sleeps?

2025-01-27.riddle: What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you?

2025-01-28.riddle: I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by everyone. What am I?

2025-01-29.riddle: What has a head and a tail but no body?

2025-01-30.riddle: What can you break, even if you never pick it up or touch it?

2025-02-01.riddle: What has many teeth, but cannot bite?

2025-02-02.riddle: I am always hungry; I must always be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?
